name: Secrétaire
maker: Martin Carlin, Edmé-François Bouillat père, and Raux aîné, et al
description: Secrétaire; Martin Carlin (French, born Germany, about 1730 - 1785, master 1766), Edmé-François Bouillat père (French, 1739/1740 - 1810), and Raux aîné (French, about 1753 - 1779), et al; Sèvres, France; about 1776 - 1777; Oak veneered with tulipwood, amaranth, holly, and ebony stringing soft-paste porcelain plaques with polychrome enamel decoration and gilding; enameled metal; gilt-bronze mounts; marble top; 107.3 x 102.9 x 35.5 cm (42 1/4 x 40 1/2 x 14 in.); 81.DA.80; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Secrétaire
medium: Oak veneered with tulipwood, amaranth, holly, and ebony stringing soft-paste porcelain plaques with polychrome enamel decoration and gilding; enameled metal; gilt-bronze mounts; marble top
